# Draft:Aviva Merritt ( Historical African-American Nurse)

Aviva Merritt (born March 4, 1941 in Birmingham, Alabama) was a historic figure who was a skilled African American surgical nurse. This helped her become a Senior Account Agent with Allstate Insurance. According to the Uncrowned Community Builders website, Merritt later led the Sickle Cell Disease Association of America (SCDAA) in Buffalo, New York. Merritt died of an unknown cause on January 18, 2007.
